description: Tap on your Profile Picture on top left corner of the screen

providers.title: Google Pay
description: Tap on your Profile Picture on top right corner of the screen
You will find your UPI ID below your name and phone number

providers.title: Paytm
description: Tap on your Profile Picture on top left corner of the screen
You will find your UPI ID below your name
